BatchMeterUsage.description: Grants permission to post metering records for a set of customers for SaaS applications

MeterUsage.description: Grants permission to emit metering records

RegisterUsage.description: Grants permission to to verify that the customer running your paid software is subscribed to your product on AWS Marketplace, enabling you to guard against unauthorized use. Meters software use per ECS task, per hour, with usage prorated to the second

ResolveCustomer.description: Grants permission to resolve a registration token to obtain a CustomerIdentifier and product code
